principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix mechanic shop vibes with barbershop precision.
Texture is Key: Use grain, noise, and metal textures to avoid digital flatness.
Lighting: Mimic warm amber workshop lights against dark walls.
Typography as Decor: Big, bold, condensed fonts like vintage posters.

usage_rules.body: Clean, readable, slightly loose leading for dark mode.

layout.grid_system: Bento Grid and Asymmetric Broken Grid
layout.spacing: Generous (p-8, p-12) to allow 'breathing room' in the dark.

hero.style: Full viewport height, video/image background with heavy vignette overlay. Text bottom-left or centered asymmetric.

services.style: Workshop Menu / Price List. Tabular data with dotted leaders or mechanic invoice style.

about.style: Split layout: Image (Garage interior) + Text (Story). Polaroid style photo frames.

gallery.style: Masonry Grid. Mix of close-ups (cuts) and wide shots (shop vibe).
elements: Hover effects: Scale up + Grayscale to Color

reviews.style: Horizontal scroll or Grid of cards. Industrial card style (bolts/rivets visual cues).

contact.style: Dark Map (Custom styles). Large footer area.

buttons.primary: bg-amber-500 text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-wider hover:bg-amber-400 rounded-sm shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_rgba(255,255,255,0.1)] transition-all active:shadow-none active:translate-x-1 active:translate-y-1
buttons.secondary: border-2 border-zinc-700 text-zinc-100 uppercase tracking-wider hover:border-amber-500 hover:text-amber-500 rounded-sm transition-colors

cards.style: bg-zinc-900 border border-zinc-800 rounded-sm p-6 hover:border-amber-500/50 transition-colors

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px or 2px. Color: Amber-500 or Zinc-400.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise overlay to the entire body background (opacity 0.03).
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid border-zinc-800. Use 'dashed' borders for separation lines to mimic tear-off receipts.

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for Nav and floating elements.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures/noise overlays are HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Configure `tailwind.config.js` with the provided colors and font families.
3. Create a global noise texture in `index.css`.
4. Build the landing page using the 'broken grid' layout for the hero.
5. Ensure the 'Book Now' CTA is prominent and uses the primary Amber color.
6. Use the provided image URLs for specific sections.
7. Add the 'Garage Story' in the About section.
8. Ensure the map in Contact section is styled dark (use CSS filter if using an iframe/image or specific map style).
